details: Lead the development of our core SaaS dashboard. Focus on performance optimization and building reusable component libraries.
Scaling high-throughput microservices. Responsible for database schema design and implementing robust API security protocols.
Build and maintain cross-platform mobile applications for a growing fintech startup. Integrate biometric auth and real-time notifications.
Design and manage CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure. Focus on automated scaling and disaster recovery strategies.
Developing end-to-end features for an e-commerce platform. Managing both frontend state and backend business logic.
Constructing large-scale data pipelines. Optimizing ETL processes to provide clean datasets for the ML research team.
Bridging the gap between design and code. Creating high-fidelity interactive prototypes and implementing complex animations.
Monitoring network traffic for security breaches. Conducting penetration tests and ensuring compliance with federal standards.
Integrating Large Language Models into existing business workflows. Developing RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) systems.
Developing automated test suites to ensure software reliability. Working closely with devs to identify bugs before deployment.
